channel.title: reviews – The Carol Singers Hire UK
channel.description: - The very best and most genuine professional carol singers in the UK

item.title: Carol Singing Trio – The Landmark Hotel
item.dc:creator: carolsingershire_wp
item.description: “The carol singers were wonderful – THANK YOU!” Lauren
item.content:encoded: “The carol singers were wonderful – THANK YOU!” Lauren

item.title: Carol Singing Trio – Microsoft Research Ltd, Cambridge
item.dc:creator: carolsingershire_wp
item.description: “Hi Tom, Thank you so much for your support with the Christmas party. The event was a great success and having Christmas carollers was a great addition to this year. We hope to work with you again next year. Many thanks” Emma, Microsoft Research Ltd
item.content:encoded: “Hi Tom, Thank you so much for your support with the Christmas party. The event was a great success and having Christmas carollers was a great addition to this year. We hope to work with you again next year.  Many thanks” Emma, Microsoft Research Ltd

item.title: Festive A Cappella Quartet – City Social, London
item.dc:creator: carolsingershire_wp
item.description: “Just to give you a brief feedback on Friday – it was excellent! The quarter were really good , great songs and fantastic delivery – all our guests enjoyed. Thanks!” Brian, CEO Survitec Group
item.content:encoded: “Just to give you a brief feedback on Friday – it was excellent! The quarter were really good , great songs and fantastic delivery – all our guests enjoyed. Thanks!” Brian, CEO Survitec Group

item.title: Eight Voice Festive Male A Cappella Choir – Claridges
item.dc:creator: carolsingershire_wp
item.description: Yet again a triumph! The boys are a wonderful team, they really look as though they’re enjoying themselves, and it’s quite infectious! Please thank them from all of us, the client was very happy….” Ann, Event Planners
item.content:encoded: Yet again a triumph! The boys are a wonderful team, they really look as though they’re enjoying themselves, and it’s quite infectious! Please thank them from all of us, the client was very happy….” Ann, Event Planners

item.title: Carol Singing Quartet – The Dorchester
item.dc:creator: carolsingershire_wp
item.description: “Thank you for Friday – it was brilliant! I meant to follow up earlier in the week but typically it’s been manic. Everyone thoroughly enjoyed your performance… and then carried on getting merry throughout the rest of the evening.” Deborah, Eland Cables
item.content:encoded: “Thank you for Friday – it was brilliant! I meant to follow up earlier in the week but typically it’s been manic. Everyone thoroughly enjoyed your performance… and then carried on getting merry throughout the rest of the evening.” Deborah, Eland Cables
